title: Bug 5983Recursive ArrayStoreException when internal editor not found
description: Reported by Brian Thomsonorg.eclipse.ui.internal.EditorManager.openInternalEditortries to load an editor, and if an exception occurs it tries tostore the Throwable into an array of java.lang.Exceptions.The problem is that org.eclipse.core.internal.runtime.InternalPlatform.runcan call the handleException method with either an Exception or aLinkageError.Since a LinkageError is not an Exception, the attemptto store it in ex[0] generates an ArrayStoreException which is unhandled.
